attributes.action: Stop the government making changes to funds available for university students.
attributes.additional_details:
Similar petition worth signing - 

• Change the cap on family income to allow more people to have bursary funded education - to cover the cost of university. 

• Introduce cap on what landlords can charge students for rent (including halls of residence).
attributes.background: There have been widespread reports across the UK that the current governments want to scrap bursaries to the poorest of students. Changing finances to loans only. Make sure this doesn't happen by signing this petition.
